text.0: may savitar the god o stones stir you according to the law.
text.1: be harnessed to the shafts and press.
text.2: stones drive calamity away drive ye away malevolence.
text.3: make ye the cows our medicine.
text.4: of one accord the upper stones giving the bull his bulllike strength.
text.5: look down with pride on those below.
text.6: may savitar the god o stones stir you as law commands for him.
